description:
Luffy must defeat the man who taught him how to fight - his own grandfather - in order to save Ace. Battling his own flesh and blood won`t be easy, but a waxy ally is there to provide back up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Each on Different Paths! Luffy vs. Garp!
Le chemin que chacun a choisi. Luffy contre Garp !
Sorezore no Eranda Michi: Luffy vs Garp!
Каждый выбирает свой путь! Луффи против Гарпа!
それぞれの選んだ道 ルフィVSガープ!
